title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: MOOC Design and Classification Short-Term Programs Applying Diverse Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: A MOOC design framework based on five major instructional theories (connectivism, situativism, constructivism, cognitivism, behaviorism) can be explained
MOOC content can be systematically analyzed using a 12-dimensional classification system
A language education MOOC prototype can be developed by applying the 7Cs learning design model
Strategies can be proposed to reduce dropout rates in medium-scale MOOCs by over 20% through high-density learner support strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
